reviews.text: Fantastic service waitress was excellent cici is the best waitress going excellent service friendly need more people like her!
Winnie Êàë‰ª¨Â•ΩÂπ∏ËøêÈÅáÂà∞Â•πÔºåÊºÇ‰∫ÆÁÉ≠ÊÉÖÔºåÊúçÂä°Âë®Âà∞ÔºåÂçÅÂàÜÊª°ÊÑèÂ•πÔºåËøòÊúâ‰ªäÂ§©ÁöÑÈ£üÁâ©ÔºåÂ•ΩÂêÉÂèà‰∏äÈïúÔºåÊÄª‰πãËøò‰ºöÂÜçÊù•ü•≥
It was a pleasant dinner thanks to the friendly service of the staff who spoke Korean.
I was drinking a glass of wine and then they asked me to leave

Love it here! The food, the service, the view ‚ù§Ô∏èüåπ Second time here for date night, and it did not disappoint! The oysters are our favorite! They are so fresh üòç We've sat both indoors and outdoors and you honestly can't lose with either option! It actually became "our spot" now and are looking forward to returning!

Went for a friend's birthday.
Friendly service
Modern Steak House experience and ambiance
GREAT food and apps
Steak cooked to perfect medium rare
Steak House prices
City Views from the rooftop bar
One minor annoyance, the ATM by the elevator had a max withdrawal of $100. That's not gonna cut if you wanted to use cash for your meal here.
Winnie was amazing! She took great care of us and was very attentive! I highly recommend coming here
All because of Winnie!

This is really an upscale spot but tragically the service & food is subpar. The manager from Hyatt recommended the happy hour Monday- Friday at 3-5 pm.

The roof top views & ambiance are 7 stars but everything else is below average.

I enjoyed the $8 Cabernet but was disappointed by the $8 meatball (skimpy 3 pieces). The meatball & slider is on happy hour menu but no different in price from regular menu.

Happy hour? I have had better sliders for $5 in Manhattan. And the meatballs are not even worth $3. This is Flushing right?

4/7/24 update:

Sunday 7 pm and the bar & restaurant is counting sheep‚Äôs üêë . GHOST TOWN .

Time to change the tune üé∂ or change management üòÖüòÖ

8/1/24:
Service has improved lots üëçüëç

10/6/24:
Happy Hour menu is removed.
Only 30% off cocktails. No wine or beer. üò§

11/26/24.
The wine menu needs to be updated to reflect the price. The bartender had to call the GM for a price quote on a glass of Cabernet. Really? The red wine offerings are for tourists‚Ä¶ üò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏èüò∂‚Äçüå´Ô∏è

Also, why have a bottle of empty Opus One on display if it‚Äôs not on the menu???

So far I‚Äôve only tried the bar food. There is no incentive for me to actually dine here based on my many visits.

Hopefully this will change in 2025‚Ä¶

FYI:
A great steak house in Manhattan has 5,000 plus reviews. A good one in Queens or Long Island should have 1,000 reviews‚Ä¶

October 2025:
Service has only degraded. After waiting 10 minutes at the bar to order a hanger steak & drink. No one was available so we walked out‚Ä¶

The service here is so amazing especially from Cici ! She‚Äôs a doll ! Food 10/10 and the vibes are immaculate. You have to check out the outside area as well for the views. So beautiful! Can‚Äôt wait to come back next trip.

My family and I dined here for a Birthday Celebration. The atmosphere is great and the service was great as well. The food was ok and the drinks were strong . My daughter enjoyed her birthday dinner and that's most important. Thank you for the experience Met Prime!
Great steak drinks and staff I highly recommend this place ask for Winnie, Cici or Vip you won't be disappointed
Mariam, the server was very professional and courteous. Great asset for the restaurant.
Marian is the BOMB! Great service!
Ask for the bartender Winnie!!!! Like Winnie the Pooh üòçü•∞üòçü•∞ Is the best bartender ever!!! The greatest drinks n food!!!! Had the best time with the best bartender!!!!
Ask for Winnie the bartender she was great!!!!
Had breakfast and drinks at Prime Met. Walk in no reservations on a Friday. Mariam, was a delight. Prompt service, great attitude. Was a pleasure. Would definitely recommend!
Miriam was amazing! Such a sweet girl, she should get a raise immediately!!!!!!

This place is great, but I‚Äôm giving them 1-star bc they added 18% to a party of four and still left space for a tip on the bill.  We nearly tipped twice.  I don‚Äôt care if this is indicated on the menu somewhere, it‚Äôs not ordinary in America, and they know a certain percentage of customers will double tip.  Shame on PRIME Mƒìt for that.
Mariam is a young lady with an excellent personality and high standards of service. Great waitress
Mariam was great! Nice service!
Mariam was amazing!

What an amazing experience at Mets Steakhouse! Winnie at the bar was amazing!! Zeki was also amazing helping around!! What an amazing team to be with and have a great time spending my night at the bar! Make sure you visit here and they‚Äôre open late night with amazing snacks. Their bone marrow and steak tartare were off the charts! Be sure to ask for them and they‚Äôre open late won‚Äôt disappoint. Loved my experience and already looking forward to my next one! Thank you all for an amazing time!!
Best meal in New York, great atmosphere, CiCi at the bar was mega!  Good night!!
Jen Ku was excellent üòÑ. Great personality

Yerrrrrr!! Sexy OVERPRICED date spot in flushing beside my fave weeb mall.

spent $250. Smh

Eat Outside. The View is AMAZING!
Staff is Kind and Attentive.
Ordered the most expensive steak. MEH.
Ordered Mashed potatoes. BLAND.
Drinks are decent.
Salmon. BLAND.

All the food is overpriced and mid.
Go for the view or to impress a date.
Cici is the best bartender in America.  Her specialty is the Old Fashioned. You have never had better. Worth finding out. She is a gem.

Cici is an absolutely fantastic bartender! She gave me great advice on drink selections, was fun to talk to, and always had a smile on her face. Her positive energy really made the experience stand out. If you‚Äôre looking for amazing service and a great vibe, Cici is the one to see!
The ambience and food is outstanding. Great service from Jen Ku. She was very friendly and attentive.
Jennifer was an amazing waiter 10 out of 10 definitely would recommend to others

It was my first time here and I loved it. The food was amazing ‚Ä¶ the service amazing! Everything was great. Jen went above and beyond to make sure everything was great. Will come back and will recommend. This
Jennifer was amazing attentive and made sure my allergy needs were carefully kept in mind
Food is great, Jennifer was amazing, definitely recommend.
rooftop is nice but service and food is nothing to come back for
Very nice atmosphere both indoor and outdoor. Our waitress Winnie made us felt very welcoming and always had a smile on her face. She gave us good suggestions on the cocktails and we all loved it.
Great view of planes taking off from LGA
10 out of 10 experience I HIGHLY RECOMMEND !
Good food and nice top floor view

I booked the private room for a business event and was very pleased. The room was narrow but accommodated a table fir 18, the food was, good, and the head server Gia was exceptional. Everything was handled smoothly. I will be back.

Me and my husband came here to eat after a watching a tennis game. We sat outside to eat the view of the city skyline was amazing. Our server Vib was very good. The food was not disappointing as well.

Food was ok!! On the pricey side of things, gratuities was already included since we had a party of 7!! Jennifer waitress was friendly & attentive but forgot 3 dishes that I ordered!! Oh wells, there is a nice out door view of the sunset & skyline & a live DJ which is nice!!

My first time here and it was amazing!! The drinks and food are so good. The scenery is very nice especially at night time. The outdoor seating area is so cozy & great to have a drink. Shirley was our waitress and she was the best!! Always came to check up on us, very attentive and explained the menu options very well.

Speaking just about the food, I honestly didn‚Äôt find anything memorable. It was all pretty average. From the photos, what I remember is that the potatoes were cut too large, the macaroni felt a bit too heavy, and the steak was decent. But since it‚Äôs a steakhouse, I feel like that‚Äôs something they‚Äôre supposed to get right. One thing I really wasn‚Äôt a fan of was the drinks. Both cocktails I tried were poorly balanced and just didn‚Äôt taste good. The dessert was also too sweet for my liking.
However, the restaurant has a nice atmosphere. The decor is elegant and makes it a good spot for a date. The Chinese server was also really attentive. He noticed I didn‚Äôt like the drinks and offered a complimentary dessert. If you go around sunset, the view from the terrace is also beautiful and you can catch some great evening skies. But one thing I‚Äôm sure of is that I won‚Äôt be coming back here to enjoy that sunset again.

The staff is very friendly and attentive. The food is delicious and the menu has a good variety to choose from. Prime Met Steakhouse is a great place to bring your family, friends, a date for dinner or you can hang at the bar to eat, drink, unwind and relax. The view from the terrace is beautiful and they also have live music on the weekends.

The atmosphere is great and such a vibe here! We definitely loved the service Winnie provided for us she was the best! The steak was very good and so were the sides. Really nice that you can enjoy rooftop views after your meal

Can‚Äôt ask for more ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
My Birthday celebration at this elegant ambiance restaurant. The rooftop patio just added another spark to the ambiance.
The food was great, service was fast despite the busy night. Would definitely want to highlight our server GIA (full of love, laughter, made sure each and everyone were happy with the service ,the food and drinks) how can we not ?? GIA was simply awesome. And there is
RAFAEL (bartender) despite so busy he made sure to get all the cocktails we requested to the table.

SURPRISE SUPRISE ‚Ä¶ MAGICIAN ERIC perform on our table. There was so much laughter.

Last but not the least JEFF and JERRY made every effort to make everyone‚Äôs  night was awesome.

PRIME MeÃÑt Steakhouse great for any sort from small to large groups
Larger groups  I recommend to have reservation.

My birthday was memorable . The ambiance ,The food ,the people , the service, the music , the view. Each and everything was awesome.

The food was exceptional, but the server Tony is what made our experience 5 stars! We were first seated inside, next to a large group of businessmen, who were loudly having a good time. Tony picked up on our discomfort with their conversations right away, and without us even having to say a word, Tony offered to move us to a table outside. The view and atmosphere were incredible. We enjoyed our dinner as we watched the skyline light up in the night sky. The dinner made for a perfect ending to our trip to Flushing.

Wow, I ordered three starters. Don‚Äôt be fooled by TikTok videos these dishes cost no more than $10 to make, but I ended up paying close to $100. The bone marrow had barely any marrow and came with just one  piece of toast.The tuna tartare was pretty bland; I‚Äôve had much better elsewhere they added 18% gratuity (this one I don‚Äôt mind) just to be careful they will ask again tip when you paying with card. The view and atmosphere nice but I rather by the ticket to the edge or the Empire State building.
Sorry, it wasn‚Äôt worth trying.

Sometimes the reviews don‚Äôt do justice to a restaurant. After reading the reviews, I was skeptical of going to this restaurant. But, my friends and I decided that we would experience it ourselves and then share our experiences with those who are thinking of going to this amazing restaurant. I made a reservation for 3 the night before for lunch and was the first to arrive. I checked-in with the hostess and she was welcoming, friendly and helpful. She offered me a table while waiting for my friends to arrive. I declined as I was early and wanted to be seated when all of us are there.

My friends arrived and we have added an extra guest and now a party of 4. We were seated promptly and cold ice water was served immediately. Thank god, as it was a sweltering humid day today. Our server/bartender was a delightful young Asian woman and we immediately felt so at ease with her recommendations when we asked her what we should order for lunch. In the meantime, we ordered 4 cocktails and they went above and beyond to find the specific liqueur to make our specially requested drink. We were very impressed.

The room was not too busy at this point but the bar was filled up. Our server/bartender did triple duty to make sure that all her guests were taken care of at the bar, the dining room and also a server. We were ready to order some appetizers and a Manager (we assume) immediately came to our table and diligently took our orders. We made a special request to have their in-house thick bacon crispy and it was delivered the way we wanted. We ordered crab cakes and shrimp cocktail as well. ALL were delicious.

It was time to have another round of cocktails and again it was promptly served. We then ordered 2 rib eyes (to share) and it was cooked to perfection. Medium rare, juicy and flavorful. The side order of creamy spinach complements the steak well. The steaks were generously portioned and we took some home as we couldn‚Äôt finish it. We ordered another round of cocktails. Then another, to close out this delicious lunch. All in all, the food, service and attention to guests were sublime. We would definitely come back for another round of the delicious steak! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

My wife and I hosted our baby shower at Prime Met Steakhouse on March 22, 2025, and it was an unforgettable experience! Ken, the event planner from the Renaissance Hotel, was absolutely incredible‚Äîattentive, helpful, and supportive throughout the entire planning process.

We had a variety of audouvers that kept flowing all our guest did not leave hungry. Also we included an open bar which every guest enjoyed. The most comments we received from the guests were about the desserts they are delicious! We booked out the whole restaurant and were able to do the gender reveal on the balcony. This is such an elegant venue with top-notch service to host events I recommend it to everyone!

Additionally, we stayed at the Renaissance Hotel the night before to set up, and Jasmine at the front desk was incredibly accommodating. Her hospitality made the experience even smoother.
I had such a good time. The waitress Jennifer was so helpful and attentive! Food was so good. I had the branzino. Would definitely recommend people attend. The rooftop was also a sexy vibe as well.

If you‚Äôre looking for an exceptional steakhouse experience, Prime mƒít is the place to be! From the moment we arrived, our Hostess VIP made us feel incredibly comfortable, providing top-tier service and expert recommendations on both dishes and drinks. The food, drinks, and desserts were truly next level‚Äîeach bite was perfection. The ambiance and d√©cor add to the experience, making it a must-visit for anyone who appreciates fine dining. Highly recommend!
Amazing food. Amazing waitress. The chef came to our table and asked how our meal was. Hands down will be back. Thank you to our waitress Winnie for everything!
Wonderful food, service, and vibes. The dessert menu is one of the best I‚Äôve ever had at a steakhouse.

Sometimes the reviews don‚Äôt do justice to a restaurant. After reading the reviews, I was skeptical of going to this restaurant. But, my friends and I decided that we would experience it ourselves and then share our experiences with those who are thinking of going to this amazing restaurant. I made a reservation for 3 the night before for lunch and was the first to arrive. I check in with the hostess and she was friendly and helpful. She offered me a table while waiting for my friends to arrive. I declined as I was early and wanted to be seated when all of us are there.

My friends arrived and we have added an extra guest and now a party of 4. We were seated promptly and cold ice water was served immediately. Thank god, as it was a sweltering humid day today. Our server/bartender was a delightful young Asian woman and we immediately felt so at ease with her recommendations and her gracious personality. We ordered 4 cocktails and they went above and beyond to find the specific liqueur to make our specially requested drink. We were very impressed.

The room was not too busy at this point but the bar was filled up. Our server/bartender did triple duty to make sure that all her guests were taken care of. We were ready to order some appetizers and a Manager (we assume)  immediately came to our table and diligently took our orders. We made a special request to have their in-house thick bacon crispy and it was delivered. We ordered crab cakes and  shrimp cocktail as well. ALL were delicious. By this time, it was beginning to get busy. Not bad for a lunch crowd on a Wednesday.

It was time to have another round of cocktails and again it was promptly served. We then orders 2 rib eyes (to share) and it was cooked to perfection. Medium rare, juicy and flavorful. The side order of creamy spinach complements the steak well. The steaks were generous portion and we took some left overs home. Then another round of cocktails were ordered. Then another to close out this delicious lunch. All in all, the food, service and attention to guests were sublime. We would definitely come back for another round of the delicious steak! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Absolutely loved my experience here! The food was delicious, fresh, and full of flavor. The staff member Shirley was warm, welcoming, and attentive from start to finish. The atmosphere was cozy and inviting‚Äîperfect for a relaxed meal or special occasion. Everything we ordered came out just right. Highly recommend and definitely looking forward to coming back soon!

We visited Prime for the first time with great expectations, especially after speaking with the managers, who were very polite, and understanding. Unfortunately, our experience with our server, Shirley, was disappointing and not at all in line with what we expected.

Throughout dinner, she was less than polite, not accommodating, and often absent or unreachable. Which honestly still would be okay if she had a better attitude. This experience was especially disheartening as we were celebrating a birthday. She never even brought the birthday guest his drink. It was awkwardness the whole evening and not welcoming.

We had a few additional members join us. We are gentle, understanding group, and we were perfectly fine if the restaurant couldn‚Äôt add more chairs to our table. They could sit separately and we would have happily enjoyed our evening regardless. However, Shirley handled the situation poorly‚Äîraising her voice at me in front of our party, ROLLING her neck, and speaking in a manner that felt unnecessarily abrasive and unprofessional. Even if the request could not be accommodated, there are much more courteous ways to communicate this but raising your voice and rolling your neck is not one of them. It was so awkward.

On the positive side, the food is good. The chef did a wonderful job, and both the bartender and the busser were far more attentive and helpful than our server, Shirley. Unfortunately, when the primary point of service is rude and unprofessional, it shifts the entire dining atmosphere and leaves guests feeling uncomfortable.

While I truly wanted to love this place‚Äîand in many ways, the food and other staff made it bareable‚Äîour server‚Äôs attitude overshadowed the evening. We all wanted to leave. We are paying guests not a charity or a burden. I would not recommend this restaurant for anyone seeking warm, or pleasant service. The birthday guest is a shy quiet person and I specifically told her not to sing happy birthday but she still tried to slide it in there, so odd. Then it made the whole table want to sing after. A dining experience should make guests feel heard, valued, welcome, and unfortunately, that was not the case here. Also, pulling me to the side to speak about a $35.00 cake fee, I don't understand because our bill was over $1600.00 so why pull me aside to speak about $35.00 not sure if this was to cause embarrassment but it was just awkward. We do not recommend visiting this restaurant definitely not for anything special or important. You never know what you're going to get.

Service: 100%
Food: 100% Value for money!
The best food I ever had while in NYC during our vacation. Winnie is a sweetheart and very kind and attentive. She went far and behind of our expectations of service and hospitality. We will definitely recommend and come back here every time we visit New York!

My waitress Pattie had great recommendations and she was always extremely attentive. The vibes of the restaurant was great and food was pretty good. I really loved the tuna tartar and the matcha cheese cake.

I had the pleasure of hosting a special event at PRIME MeÃÑt Steakhouse in Flushing, and it was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment we walked in, the ambiance was elegant yet inviting ‚Äî the perfect setting for both celebrations and intimate dinners.

What truly made the experience outstanding was the level of service. The staff were professional, attentive, and went above and beyond to accommodate our needs. A special thank you to the manager, Ken , who personally ensured that every detail was taken care of. His presence and hands-on approach were deeply appreciated, especially when weather challenges arose ‚Äî he made what felt impossible, possible.

The food was absolutely phenomenal. Every dish was cooked to perfection ‚Äî the steaks were rich, flavorful, and tender, while the sides and cocktails complemented the meal beautifully. To top it off, the owner graciously offered us a glass of wine, which made our guests feel especially welcomed and valued.

If you're looking for a place in Flushing that delivers on quality, service, and experience, PRIME MeÃÑt Steakhouse is it. I‚Äôll definitely be returning, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a top-tier dining experience.

Came here yesterday for a lunch meeting and I was amazed with the foods, views at the outdoor space, and most importantly one of the best services by our waitress ‚ÄúWinnie‚Äù. They also offer free valet parking. The whole experience was so wonderful and mostly due to the amazing services and menu recommendations by Winnie. Thank you so much and we will come again soon!

A bit slow on the service and green on some of the support staff, but great overall experience. Steak was excellent, drinks top notch. Amazing level in a surprising but logical location. Update 5/27/23 - service still very-very slow, especially on drinks. The food was slow to come out but even the slow appetizers were quicker than the drinks, which took about 20 minutes. Not the fault of the wait staff but they definitely need to hire a new bartender or hire 2 more if the bar is that slow, there's enough room for at least 4 bartenders. Also, understandably, at least a quarter to a third of the guests are IG / TikTok / other social media purpose guests, so the quality/variety of the food isn't the purpose of visiting, but perhaps some seasonal changes to the menu would be welcomed.
Êù±Ë•øÈÇÑÁÆóÂ•ΩÂêÉÔºåÂÉπÈå¢‰πüÂêàÁêÜÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂõ†ÁÇ∫Â•≥ÊúçÂãôÁîüËáâ‰∏äÂÆåÂÖ®Ê≤íÊúâÁ¨ëÂÆπÔºåËÄå‰∏î‰πü‰∏çÊúÉÁÇ∫È°ßÂÆ¢Âä†Ê∞¥Ôºå‰ªÄÈ∫º‰πü‰∏çÂõûÊáâÔºåËÆì‰∫∫‰∏çÊúÉÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÂÜçÂéª„ÄÇ

Went for dinner about a week ago, and where do I begin?

The place is located on the 12th floor of the renaissance hotel. Amazing views and beautiful set up to the restaurant. Staff was friendly and engaging from the moment we got up to the hostess stand. The hostess guided us to our table and handed us the menu while the server attending to us promptly showed up.

We received an assortment of breads not even 2 minutes after we placed our order. Bread was warm and delicious, and their herb butter was even better.

Got the porter house Medium Rare, the chicken, green beans, fingerling potatoes and the asparagus side. The steak was perfectly cooked and rested. Roasted garlic on the side gave it a nice touch. The chicken was phenomenal, crispy, juicy, and the leaks and white bean puree paired perfectly with it. All 3 sides were amazing but the stand out was the asparagus. That bacon aioli is to die for. Overall the experience was great, my wife and I were blown away and will definitely be back.

The food's quality is alright, possibly influenced by the waiter's lack of professionalism given the prices. We ordered a variety of dishes, including steaks, lamb chops, and lobster. The steaks seemed a bit dry, which could be because the iron plate cooled too quickly. Unfortunately, the lobster didn't taste very fresh.

Located inside a hotel, this steakhouse has a stellar view of Queens and Manhattan. I only came for the rooftop and drinks, so I'm not able to say much about the food.

On their rooftop, they have a live DJ (who was actually really good, and played tropical house), and a stellar view. The ambiance was great and it's a good spot for drinks with friends.

100 stars if I could! This lovely steakhouse has an amazing and attentive staff with the most wonderful services. Me, my fianc√© and our child came here on a Saturday night and we were blown away by how amazing all the dishes tasted! You might come to a steakhouse just to get the steaks but here you can get everything else too. Few of the many appetizers we got were the roasted bone marrow, edamame, oysters, tomato and burrata, and the crispiest jumbo lump crab cake!
And the sides to get with your main course (should be STEAK!!!) should be the lobster Mac and cheese, foraged mushrooms, cauliflower fried rice! I promise you won‚Äôt be disappointed with anything you get here :) me and my family definitely was very impressed with everything and happy with how delicious everything was!

Steakhouse on top of the Renaissance Hotel in Flushing, NY. Restaurant was clean and well maintained. Wait Staff was friendly. Bartender was nice. The Bone Marrow was delicious. Tuna Tartare was good, needed some salt in my opinion. The steaks were just okay, not worth the price. Nothing special about it.

Entering the restaurant from the hotel elevator to the 12th floor,
you are greeted by visually striking mirrored decorations, warm lighting, and stylish furniture ‚Äì with marble tabletops and leather seating creating a luxurious yet comfortable vibe.
The window offers a charming cityscape viewüèôÔ∏è.
The terrace features brightly colored seating and an adorable vintage camper van, with a DJ setting a lively atmosphere‚Äîperfect for relaxing gatherings on sunny days.
I especially love enjoying the sunset moments on the terraceüåá.
The city skyline looks exceptionally moving and romantic in the evening glowüíï.

Highly recommendedüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
‚≠êÔ∏è Roasted Bone Marrow
Short ribs accompanied by bread pudding and caramelized onions, the roasting brings out the rich and mellow flavors of the marrow, wonderfully complemented by the sweetness of the caramelized onions and the rich texture of the bread pudding.

‚≠êÔ∏è Jumbo Lump Crabcake
Served with tender celery and lemon-cured egg yolk sauce, the crabcakes are crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, the crabmeat is deliciously juicy, paired with the lemon egg yolk sauce adding a refreshing touch of sour sweetness.

‚≠êÔ∏è Porterhouse
A 25-ounce cut from Black Angus, this steak is tender and juicy with a slightly charred exterior and a rich, succulent interior.

‚≠êÔ∏è Sides
Bacon strips: Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, full of salty savory flavor.
Mashed potatoes: Smooth and creamy, with a light buttery flavor and the sweet taste of potatoes.

‚≠êÔ∏è Strawberry Basil Margarita üç∏
Mixed with mezcal, lime juice, orange liqueur, blue agave tequila, strawberries, and basil leaves, offering a refreshing fruity taste with a sweet strawberry and aromatic basil blend.

‚≠êÔ∏è Berry Thyme üçπ
A mix of strawberries, raspberries, blueberries, and thyme, this drink has a sweet and sour berry flavor with a subtle hint of thyme, no alcoholÔΩûSuitable for friends who like sweet refreshing drinksüíï
Food was amazing, outside rooftop, skyline of the city, 12/10 time! Cici had the best service, will definitely be recommending this place!

A new restaurant with a great dining experience. The place is located in the rooftop (12th floor) and you get amazing skyline views as far as reaching Manhattan. It has a bar and dining areas, and overall it feels very cozy and warming. We went with the chief tasting menu, and almost all the dishes were perfect. Our favorite the lobster plate and the steak. The staff was polite and attentive, there‚Äôs parking underground and you need to enter through the 39th street. While the menu is a little bit pricey, I think it‚Äôs worth it and you‚Äôll have a good experience. Perfect spot for dates, group of friends, celebration or just enjoying a cocktail while watching the sunset.

A great place for a steak dinner! 4.5/5 stars tbh.

The aged porterhouse was fantastic. It was my first time having aged meat. It was more tender and had a "cheesy" flavor to it, which I really enjoyed. $135 for the meat (worth it I think).

The bone marrow was great. Paired with the spreads, it was a great start to the meal.

The garlic fried rice is superb. Rich in flavor. The Chinese sausage in the rice is always a great addition.

The Brussel Sprouts were my least favorite in the meal. A little too greasy and not enough crisp.

Service was excellent. We went on a Friday afternoon. Not busy.

Would recommend!

We had 1 drink each. Then ordered a few apps. The bone marrow was interesting. Tuna tartar is decent. It was paired with pickled leaves. Crab cake was good too but wished there were 2. The Bourbon gives 2 with better price. The porterhouse is the better 1 than the filet mignon.
